title: Kylie Jenner 'nearly destroyed' by Travis Scott breakup
text:
Kylie’s been through some serious heartbreak (Picture: Instagram/kyliejenner/Getty)

Kylie Jenner’s shock split from Travis Scott really ‘hurt her’ as the rapper felt ‘stifled’ by his home life, according to an insider.

The Keeping Up with the Kardashians star suffered a real blow when she and Travis called time on their relationship last month, despite having their daughter Stormi together.

We were all stunned into a state of confusion when Kylie and Travis, 28, announced their breakup in September after two and a half years of dating and now an insider has revealed that the reality star, 22, was not ok when it all kicked off.

The source told Heat magazine: ‘Kylie clung on to this relationship as long as she could.

‘Things hadn’t been good for a while, but she was so sure they could work things out.’

Kylie fell pregnant weeks into her relationship with Travis (Picture: Dia Dipasupil/FilmMagic)

Going on to explain why it may have ended, they put it down to everything happening so quickly, adding: ‘She got pregnant just weeks into the relationship – and she’s spent the past couple of years trying to coax Travis into a more settled family routine.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

In the end, the Highest in the Room rapper was allegedly having none of it and decided they should take a break.

Travis said he loves Stormi, but couldn’t give Kylie what she wanted. (Picture: Instagram/@kyliejenner)

‘He hated hurting Kylie and it nearly destroyed her,’ explained the insider, ‘but he knows he knows he can’t give her what she wants.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted both Kylie and Travis’s reps for comment.

Following confirmation of their split on Twitter, Kylie said their friendship and Stormi are their priorities.

And proving to everyone that she’s the boss, Kylie stepped out at Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin’s wedding looking fierce with Stormi at her side, despite nursing a broken heart.

MORE: Travis Scott blasts claims he cheated on Kylie Jenner after shock split
description: Reality TV star and self-made billionaire Kylie Jenner was pretty torn up when things ended with Travis Scott.
